channel.title: Madness Combat.
channel.description:
Who here's heard of it?
It's a flash series on Newgrounds. Essentially, it's just a bunch of guys with floating hands, and crosses for faces shooting and slicing each other, with some story in it.
Check it out.
[url]https://www.newgrounds.com/collection/madness[/url]

item.title: Madness Combat.
item.dc:creator: Cheshyre_Parrot
item.description:
I mean, Strype put a LOT of effort into making these pictures.

Anyone else thinks it’s ironic that the impact i’m probably having is probably going to cause less people to view Madness Combat just because I reccomended it?

Read full topic

Hey, let’s go easy on him. He’s already making some progress, the furry fagg-- agh, sorry.

Well you must say you are a little aroused by it…

item.title: Madness Combat.
item.dc:creator: Cheshyre_Parrot
item.description:
Hey, I remember playing that one.

And thanks for reminding me about the name of the site.

Surprisingly, that is one of the better remakes, I swear.

Read full topic

item.title: Madness Combat.
item.dc:creator: Rossman
item.description:
That was Matrix Rayne. I was a frequent member there. Download this .rar then just extract them. you need the two files in the same folder in order for the game to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Madness Combat.
item.dc:creator: Cheshyre_Parrot
item.description:
Oh?

If it’s decent or not, I’d like to see what it is.

I remember playing some shitty ones on some website whos name escapes me. I remember one called something like the “TAR” mod. Terror Assault Recon. It was fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Madness Combat.

In fact I still have it on my computer.
